title: "Stress test method detects when deep object recognition models are using shortcuts"
excerpt: "A new “stress test” method created by a Georgia Tech researcher allows programmers to more easily determine if trained visual recognition models are sensitive to input changes or rely too heavily on context clues to perform their tasks."
